DOC.brief_summary: In study , evaluate acute coronary syndrome patient see correlation platelet activity , genetic polymorphism ( CYP2C19 ABCB1 ) , serum adipokines level , Clopidogrel responsiveness .
DOC.brief_title: The Correlation Between Genetic Polymorphism , Platelet Activity , Clopidogrel Responsiveness , Serum Adipokine Concentration Asian Acute Coronary Syndrome Patients
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age > 18 y/o 2 . Acute coronary syndrome patient 3 . Chronic coronary artery disease patient 4 . Healthy volunteer 1 . Patient refusal 2 . Allergy Clopidogrel 3 . Receive Gp IIb/IIIa inhibitor simultaneously 4 . Cancer history 5 . Severe renal liver function impairment 6 . Coagulopathy
DOC.keyword: Acute coronary syndrome chronic coronary artery disease patient
